panels.title: Download Packets
Flows Map ( IP: $ip)
Download Packets
Flows Breakdown by Application

targets.query: SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("client_ip" =~ /^$ip$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($resolution), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(0)

panels.title: Total Flows by TCP Application for Network Monitor: $network_monitor

targets.query: SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("client_ip" =~ /^$ip$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($resolution), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(0)

panels.title: Total Flows by UDP Application for Network Monitor: $network_monitor
Flow Data Overview Network Monitor: $network_monitor

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_per_s") AS "bytes", sum("fragments") AS "fragments" FROM "flow_data_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip_protocol_name" =~ /^$ip_protocol$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "source_ip", "destination_ip", "ip_protocol_name", "application_port"

panels.title: Flows Details (protocol: $ip_protocol application: $application)

targets.query: show series cardinality  from flow_data_4_tuple

targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON indicators FROM flow_data_4_tuple WITH KEY = "source_ip"

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_per_s") AS "bytes", sum("fragments") AS "fragments" FROM "flow_data_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip_protocol_name" =~ /^$ip_protocol$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "source_ip", "destination_ip", "ip_protocol_name", "application_port"

panels.title: Data and Flows Web Server (Source)

targets.query: SELECT sum("retransmissions_client") + sum("retransmissions_server") FROM "tcp_4_tuple" WHERE ("client_ip" =~ /^$ip$/ OR "server_ip" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($resolution), "server_ip", "client_ip" fill(0)

panels.title: Web Server Data (Source) for Network Monitor: $network_monitor

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_per_s") AS "bytes", sum("fragments") AS "fragments" FROM "flow_data_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip_protocol_name" =~ /^$ip_protocol$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "source_ip", "destination_ip", "ip_protocol_name", "application_port"

panels.title: Data and Flows Web Server (Destination)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_per_s") FROM "flow_data_4_tuple" WHERE ("network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND "ip_protocol_name" = 'TCP' AND "destination_tls_hostname" != ''  AND "destination_tls_hostname" != 'none' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($resolution), "destination_tls_hostname" fill(none)
